roleset.name: moving with a whooshing noise
roleset.note: WHOOSH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'whoosh' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2. (from whoosh.01-v)
WHOOSH-V NOTES: No VN class for this sense. (from whoosh.02-v)
WHOOSHING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, VNcls sound_emission-43.2. (from whooshing.01-n)

role.descr: thing actually in motion: noise, air, propelled thing

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Ethan saved the day with his wooshing in the air and xray vision.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: I so delighted in listening to the sound of the needle tracking, its whooshing through the grooves, and the immediacy of the music, that I had to share the experience with my new friends on this blog.

example.name: args 0 , 1
example.text: His whooshing a sigh of relief alerted the guards.

example.name: args 1, PRD
example.text: Shaped like an axis, the wind turbines would be powered by the whooshing of the wind caused by the passing vehicles rushing at the average speed of 70 mph.

example.name: args 1, 2 again
example.text: Besides, isn't the whooshing of air over the fingers part of the natural sound of a piano

example.name: all args
example.text: His whooshing the kite in fast circles dizzied the crowd

example.name: poor John
example.text: The wind whooshed as John's coffin was carried to the graveyard.
example.arg: as John's coffin was carried to the graveyard

example.name: also intransitive
example.text: ``Tivoli Motel,'' I read a sign in the usual pronunciation of the name as we whoosh through.
